ps2.1:3.3: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
ps2.1:3.4: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto sannojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.

ps2.1:5.2: Tassa samathavipassanam yuganaddham bhavayato maggo sanjayati.

ps2.1:6.4: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.

ps2.1:8.3: Tattha jate dhamme aniccato anupassanatthena vipassana, dukkhato anupassanatthena vipassana, anattato anupassanatthena vipassana.
ps2.1:8.8: tattha jatanam dhammanam anativattanatthena bhavana, indriyanam ekarasatthena bhavana, tadupagaviriyavahanatthena bhavana, asevanatthena bhavana.
ps2.1:9.2: Dassanatthena sammaditthi maggo sanjayati, abhiniropanatthena sammasankappo maggo sanjayati, pariggahatthena sammavaca maggo sanjayati, samutthanatthena sammakammanto maggo sanjayati, vodanatthena sammaajivo maggo sanjayati, paggahatthena sammavayamo maggo sanjayati, upatthanatthena sammasati maggo sanjayati, avikkhepatthena sammasamadhi maggo sanjayati—
ps2.1:10.1: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti asevatiti katham asevati?
ps2.1:10.2: Avajjanto asevati, jananto asevati, passanto asevati, paccavekkhanto asevati, cittam adhitthahanto asevati, saddhaya adhimuccanto asevati, viriyam pagganhanto asevati, satim upatthapento asevati, cittam samadahanto asevati, pannaya pajananto asevati, abhinneyyam abhijananto asevati, parinneyyam parijananto asevati, pahatabbam pajahanto asevati, bhavetabbam bhavento asevati, sacchikatabbam sacchikaronto asevati—
ps2.1:11.2: Avajjanto bhaveti, jananto bhaveti, passanto bhaveti, paccavekkhanto bhaveti, cittam adhitthahanto bhaveti, saddhaya adhimuccanto bhaveti, viriyam pagganhanto bhaveti, satim upatthapento bhaveti, cittam samadahanto bhaveti, pannaya pajananto bhaveti, abhinneyyam abhijananto bhaveti, parinneyyam parijananto bhaveti, pahatabbam pajahanto bhaveti, bhavetabbam bhavento bhaveti, sacchikatabbam sacchikaronto bhaveti—
ps2.1:12.2: Avajjanto bahulikaroti, jananto bahulikaroti, passanto bahulikaroti, paccavekkhanto bahulikaroti, cittam adhitthahanto bahulikaroti, saddhaya adhimuccanto bahulikaroti, viriyam pagganhanto bahulikaroti, satim upatthapento bahulikaroti, cittam samadahanto bahulikaroti, pannaya pajananto bahulikaroti, abhinneyyam abhijananto bahulikaroti, parinneyyam parijananto bahulikaroti, pahatabbam pajahanto bahulikaroti, bhavetabbam bhavento bahulikaroti, sacchikatabbam sacchikaronto bahulikaroti—
ps2.1:13.1: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto sannojanani pahiyanti anusaya byantihontiti katham sannojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti?

ps2.1:17.14: Arahattamaggena ruparago, aruparago, mano, uddhaccam, avijja—
ps2.1:18.2: Aniccato anupassanatthena vipassana, dukkhato anupassanatthena vipassana, anattato anupassanatthena vipassana.
ps2.1:18.3: Tattha jatanam dhammananca vosaggarammanata cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo.
ps2.1:18.4: Samadhi iti pathamam vipassana, paccha samatho.
ps2.1:19.1: Rupam aniccato anupassanatthena vipassana, rupam dukkhato anupassanatthena vipassana, rupam anattato anupassanatthena vipassana.
ps2.1:19.2: Tattha jatanam dhammananca vosaggarammanata cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi.
ps2.1:20.6: jaramaranam aniccato anupassanatthena vipassana, jaramaranam dukkhato …pe…
ps2.1:20.8: Tattha jatanam dhammananca vosaggarammanata cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi.
ps2.1:21.3: Arammanatthena gocaratthena pahanatthena pariccagatthena vutthanatthena vivattanatthena santatthena panitatthena vimuttatthena anasavatthena taranatthena animittatthena appanihitatthena sunnatatthena ekarasatthena anativattanatthena yuganaddhatthena.
ps2.1:22.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodharammano, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodharammana.
ps2.1:22.3: Iti arammanatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:23.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:23.3: Iti gocaratthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:24.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodhagocaro, avijjasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:24.3: Iti pahanatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:25.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pariccajato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodhagocaro, avijjasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca pariccajato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:25.3: Iti pariccagatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:26.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vutthahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodhagocaro, avijjasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vutthahato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:26.3: Iti vutthanatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:27.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vivattato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodhagocaro, avijjasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vivattato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:27.3: Iti vivattanatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:28.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi santo honti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana santa hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:28.3: Iti santatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:29.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi panito hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana panita hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:29.3: Iti panitatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:30.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi kamasava vimutto hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana avijjasava vimutta hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:30.3: Iti ragaviraga cetovimutti avijjaviraga pannavimutti vimuttatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:31.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi kamasavena anasavo hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana avijjasavena anasava hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:31.3: Iti anasavatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:32.2: Uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca tarato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi nirodhagocaro, avijjasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca tarato anupassanatthena vipassana nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:32.3: Iti taranatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:33.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi sabbanimittehi animitto hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana sabbanimittehi animitta hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:33.3: Iti animittatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:34.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi sabbapanidhihi appanihito hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana sabbapanidhihi appanihita hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:34.3: Iti appanihitatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:35.2: Uddhaccam pajahato cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samadhi sabbabhinivesehi sunno hoti nirodhagocaro, avijjam pajahato anupassanatthena vipassana sabbabhinivesehi sunna hoti nirodhagocara.
ps2.1:35.3: Iti sunnatatthena samathavipassana ekarasa honti, yuganaddha honti, annamannam nativattantiti.
ps2.1:35.12: Imehi solasahi akarehi samathavipassanam yuganaddham bhaveti, evam samathavipassanam yuganaddham bhaveti.
ps2.1:36.2: Aniccato manasikaroto obhaso uppajjati, obhaso dhammoti obhasam avajjati, tato vikkhepo uddhaccam.
ps2.1:36.3: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamanaso aniccato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati, dukkhato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati, anattato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati.
ps2.1:36.5: “dhammuddhaccaviggahitamanaso hoti so samayo, yam tam cittam ajjhattameva santitthati sannisidati ekodi hoti samadhiyati.
ps2.1:36.7: evam maggo sanjayati, evam sannojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
ps2.1:37.1: Aniccato manasikaroto nanam uppajjati, piti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukham uppajjati, adhimokkho uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upatthanam uppajjati, upekkha uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati, “nikanti dhammo”ti nikantim avajjati.
ps2.1:37.3: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamanaso aniccato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati, dukkhato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati, anattato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati.
ps2.1:37.5: “dhammuddhaccaviggahitamanaso hoti so samayo, yam tam cittam ajjhattameva santitthati sannisidati ekodi hoti samadhiyati.
ps2.1:37.8: evam maggo sanjayati, evam sannojanani pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
ps2.1:38.2: anattato manasikaroto obhaso uppajjati …pe… nanam uppajjati, piti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukham uppajjati, adhimokkho uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upatthanam uppajjati, upekkha uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati, “nikanti dhammo”ti nikantim avajjati.
ps2.1:38.4: Tena uddhaccena viggahitamanaso anattato upatthanam, aniccato upatthanam, dukkhato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati.
ps2.1:39.10: jaramaranam dukkhato manasikaroto, jaramaranam anattato manasikaroto obhaso uppajjati …pe… nanam uppajjati, piti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukham uppajjati, adhimokkho uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upatthanam uppajjati, upekkha uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati, “nikanti dhammo”ti nikantim avajjati.
ps2.1:39.14: Jaramaranam aniccato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati, jaramaranam dukkhato upatthanam yathabhutam nappajanati.
ps2.1:39.17: So samayo, yam tam cittam ajjhattameva santitthati sannisidati ekodi hoti samadhiyati.
ps2.1:44.3: Na ca vikkhipate cittam na kilissati,
ps2.1:45.1: Imehi catuhi thanehi cittassa sankhepavikkhepaviggahitam dasa thane sampajanatiti.
